lead_paragraph: KAYE--Honorable Judith S. at home on January 7, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Stephen. She is survived by her children, Luisa Kaye Hagemeier, Jonathan Kaye, and Gordon Kaye; seven grandchildren; and brother, Allen Smith and beloved sister-in-law Penelope Smith; as well as many cherished nieces, nephews, cousins and other relatives. Funeral service will be held on Monday, 10am, January 11, 2016 at a venue to be announced, followed by private burial. The family requests that any donations be made to JALBCA (www.jalbca.org) or The PJCJC Fund, Inc. for the Judith S. Kaye Scholarship to support a youth in foster care who is attending college (pjcjc@nycourts.gov). 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KAYE, HONORABLE JUDITH S
